nodes.title: A convoy of Russian supply trucks and attack vehicles headed for Kyiv, "has made little discernible progress in over three days," Britain’s defense ministry said, "having been delayed by staunch Ukrainian resistance, mechanical breakdown and congestion." https://t.co/lmwh83m5Ba
nodes.author: The New York Times

localize.full_text: キエフに向かうロシアの補給トラックと攻撃車両の車列は、「3日以上にわたってほとんど目に見える進展がなかった」と英国国防省は述べ、「ウクライナの強固な抵抗、機械の故障、混雑によって遅れている」https://t.co/lmwh83m5Ba。
前往基辅的俄罗斯补给卡车和攻击车车队，"在三天多的时间里几乎没有取得明显的进展，"英国国防部说，"由于乌克兰的顽强抵抗、机械故障和拥堵而被拖延。" https://t.co/lmwh83m5Ba
前往基輔的俄羅斯補給卡車和攻擊車車隊，"在三天多的時間裏幾乎沒有取得明顯的進展，"英國國防部說，"由於烏克蘭的頑強抵抗、機械故障和擁堵而被拖延。" https://t.co/lmwh83m5Ba

nodes.title:
Medical students at a university in Sumy, Ukraine, saw their school become a war zone overnight. They have no way to travel home and are hoping that authorities can create a safe corridor for them to evacuate.

https://t.co/xHOwyhWa0d https://t.co/bU0D8c5gPk

https://t.co/xHOwyhWa0d https://t.co/bU0D8c5gPk

https://t.co/xHOwyhWa0d https://t.co/bU0D8c5gPk

nodes.title: A former Fox News producer was charged with violating U.S. sanctions by working for a Russian oligarch who has been accused of being a leading financial supporter of separatists in Crimea and eastern Ukraine and has close ties to President Vladimir Putin. https://t.co/wb9tyM3zJs

nodes.title:
“We have a special people, an extraordinary people,” President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine said on Thursday at his first news conference since the war began.

Zelensky’s defiance has made him a symbol of Ukraine’s resistance to the Russian invasion.

https://t.co/Ba5mWOOXP5
nodes.author: The New York Times

localize.full_text:
「私たちには特別な国民、並外れた国民がいる」と、ウクライナのヴォロディミル・ゼレンスキー大統領は木曜日、開戦後初の記者会見で述べた。

ゼレンスキー氏の反骨精神は、ロシアの侵攻に対するウクライナの抵抗の象徴となった。

https://t.co/Ba5mWOOXP5

"乌克兰总统沃洛基米尔-泽连斯基(Volodymyr Zelensky)周四在战争开始后的第一次新闻发布会上说："我们有一个特殊的民族，一个不寻常的民族。

泽伦斯基的反抗使他成为乌克兰抵抗俄罗斯入侵的象征。

https://t.co/Ba5mWOOXP5

"烏克蘭總統沃洛基米爾-澤連斯基(Volodymyr Zelensky)週四在戰爭開始後的第一次新聞發佈會上說："我們有一個特殊的民族，一個不尋常的民族。

澤倫斯基的反抗使他成爲烏克蘭抵抗俄羅斯入侵的象徵。

https://t.co/Ba5mWOOXP5

nodes.title:
More than 800 medical students are stranded at their university in the city of Sumy in northeastern Ukraine, officials said, after Russian forces hindered access to roads and trains. The students are mostly from African countries and India.
https://t.co/d0VTAgAdTW

localize.full_text:

https://t.co/d0VTAgAdTW

官员们说，在俄罗斯军队阻碍道路和火车通行后，800多名医学生被困在他们位于乌克兰东北部苏梅市的大学里。这些学生大多来自非洲国家和印度。
https://t.co/d0VTAgAdTW

https://t.co/d0VTAgAdTW

In Opinion

"The invasion of Ukraine is a waking nightmare, horrible and absurd. And it’s being done in our name," Alexey Kovalev, an editor at the independent Russian news outlet Meduza, writes in a guest essay. https://t.co/fwwN4veu3A

localize.full_text:
オピニオン

「ウクライナへの侵攻は悪夢であり、恐ろしくて不条理だ。そして、それは我々の名の下に行われている」と、ロシアの独立系ニュースメディア「Meduza」の編集者、アレクセイ・コバレフがゲスト・エッセイで書いている。https://t.co/fwwN4veu3A。

在意见中

"对乌克兰的入侵是一场清醒的噩梦，可怕而荒谬。它是以我们的名义进行的，"独立的俄罗斯新闻媒体Meduza的编辑Alexey Kovalev在一篇特约文章中写道。https://t.co/fwwN4veu3A

在意見中

"對烏克蘭的入侵是一場清醒的噩夢，可怕而荒謬。它是以我們的名義進行的，"獨立的俄羅斯新聞媒體Meduza的編輯Alexey Kovalev在一篇特約文章中寫道。https://t.co/fwwN4veu3A
